data.name: Yesterdreamt
data.detailed_description:
(Yesterdreamt is still in early development. Gameplay mechanics, camera behavior, visuals and story will be subject to change.)

Calamity has struck and the land is being devoured! The World Shackles keep the Burghs of Olde from drifting into the void. The Dreamweavers, powerful magi kept in eternal slumber, manifest the Reverie and so hide What Lies Between. The weavers' burden is what keeps us sane.

You are a Gunslinger, void-touched, and protector of the Realm. One day, your vessel crashes while escorting a transport between the Burghs along a World Shackle. How will you find your way back to civilization? What will you have to do to stay alive? How will you honor the Gunslinger's Creed?

Shoot your way through a gamut of enemies


Aim 360° around you


Explore a crumbling world


Collect sigil cards to power useful magicks


  • Hand-drawn 2D style
  • Unique setting: old west and cosmic horror with a dash of steampunk
  • Unique magicks system
  • Full Controller support
  • Sidescrolling twin-stick
  • "Utility-gated", Metroidvania-style exploration

data.short_description: In this twin-stick Metroidvania, you face an onslaught of unimaginable horrors armed only with a six-shooter and your Wit. Shoot your way through a crumbling world, uncover secret magicks and find your way back home. Above all, don't forget who you are.

content_descriptors.notes: Yesterdreamt features cosmic horror and body horror, though rendered in a hand-drawn, comic book style.
